channel.title: New PI Dupe, help please?
channel.description:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sYPC6Xtbc1Q
Just saw this video, does anyone know how to fix it
Deals w/ trading, then going to a npc attacking it and xlogging. I've been trying to fix it for hours and nothing works.

item.title: New PI Dupe, help please?
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:

Games should be saved after completing a trade anyways

item.title: New PI Dupe, help please?

item.description:
@Camballer wrote:

Find your savegame method and add it under your trading method. If you can’t figure it out let me know.

item.title: New PI Dupe, help please?
item.dc:creator: @Kaelan21 Kaelan21
item.description:
@Kaelan21 wrote:

[quote=“Camballer, post:4, topic:544806”]Implement a method that doesnt allow VPN’s to connect. It’s pretty easy to do.

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/snippets/401839-pi-hostname-blacklisting.html[/quote]

Would that even work for hotspot shield? it constantly gains new IP’S

Also, what if someone uses a friend to do the dupe? They’ll still be able to do it

Read full topic

item.title: New PI Dupe, help please?
item.dc:creator: @Camballer Camballer
item.description:
@Camballer wrote:

Implement a method that doesnt allow VPN’s to connect. It’s pretty easy to do.

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/snippets/401839-pi-hostname-blacklisting.html

item.title: New PI Dupe, help please?
item.dc:creator: @Kaelan21 Kaelan21
item.description:
@Kaelan21 wrote:

Camballer:

Doesn’t look legitimate, could barely understand what even happened. Test it on your source before you do it. Also you can limit them to 1 client connection per IP, which basically ruins that dupe from what I could see. Check your trade and tradeandduel class and make sure you can’t walk while trading. That’s a pretty well known problem in a lot of those types of servers.

I tested it and it works :(. 1 client connect per IP wouldn’t really work since you can just use hotspotshield etc. I’ll try out the not walking while trading aspect but that wouldn’t work either to be honest. It’s after he traded already, he attacks a NPC and then closes the client and logs in and has his items.

Read full topic
